text:
It is OBSCENE that the thoughtless idiots in the White House, who refuse to wear masks, can be tested every single day, but Americans who take safety precautions still can't get a single test if they need it.

It's a COVID-19 spit in the face.

domain.name: Political Body
domain.description: A section of a government, like The Supreme Court

entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice
